at this point the Teenage Mutant Ninja
Turtles are a pop culture institution
beloved by several generations of
children including my eight-year-old and
his friends so it's easy to forget that
at the time when the Teenage Mutant
Ninja Turtles movie was released in 1990
there was more than a little concern
about the turtle's influence on kids the
criticism came down to two main issues
the level of violence in the video games
and TV series and the utter ubiquity of
the turtles is pitch Bend for products
directed at children and let's face it
there's not nothing to that the turtles

in a lot of commercials of course kids
were substantially less concerned about
that stuff than either their parents or

the movie Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
